<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="324.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" />
<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="324.0" layoutY="558.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="76.0" text="Send" />

Hello! I am Duke, and I am pleased to serve you!
Here are the following commands (case sensitive):
1) list: List out all the tasks added
2) done x: Set the task number (x) to done
3) todo [taskname]: Add a To-Do task with taskname!
4) event [taskname] /at [datetime]: Add an event with a taskname together with the date/time!
5) deadline [taskname] /by [datetime]: Add an deadline with a taskname together with the date/time!
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
